description: Raspberry Pi general system monitoring dashboard.

targets.query: SELECT  sum("bsent") FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference(last("bytes_sent")) AS "bsent" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$netif$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none))

SELECT  sum("bsent") FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference(last("bytes_sent")) AS "bsent" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$netif$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none))
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("usage_iowait"), 1s) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT  sum("bsent") FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference(last("bytes_sent")) AS "bsent" FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$netif$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none))
SELECT non_negative_difference(last("bytes_recv")) FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$netif$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)
SELECT max("usage_idle") 100 - FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cpu"
SELECT mean("load1"), mean("load5"), mean("load15") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "name" =~ /$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT mean(inodes_used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/  AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(inodes_used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/  AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"

options.content: At the time of writing alerts do not support templated variables and only work on graphs. Therefore these dedicated panels were created to enable alerts.

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

list.label: Mountpoint
list.name: mountpoint
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.label: Network interface
list.name: netif
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$server/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "procstat" WITH KEY = "process_name"
list.label: Processes
list.name: processes
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "procstat" WITH KEY = "process_name"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "procstat" WITH KEY = "user"
list.label: User
list.name: user
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "procstat" WITH KEY = "user"

title: Raspberry Pi Monitoring Advanced
